ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Cultural Armor costs...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok.. So which one of these is the Southeast camp? Camp 1, 2, or 3? I never got killed by Qued, but I did kick his arse plenty of times. Next time I see him
ygData.messageBody:
Ok.. So which one of these is the Southeast camp?
Camp 1, 2, or 3?
I never got killed by Qued, but I did kick his arse plenty of times.
Next time I see him I'll kick it again, just for you. :-)
I got irritated bc PegLeg and his group conned green to me yet they managed
to kill me.
I think they were waaay underconning.
I got even though. Now I just have to get even with Embassador Dvinn...
luv,
-Su

> There are 3 goblin camps that I know of in BB. First one if you are
coming
> from Gfay run till you get to the buildings (the 2 with vendors) and take
a
> right after the first building and just go straight out there is one
there.
> Goblin Wizards can spawn here and can kill you pretty fast if your not
> careful.
>
> Second one when you come to the next building after the one mentioned
before
> this (called the cross roads on my server, 2 guards and one dwarf in
silver
> plate Nyzil Xxxxxxxx) go straight past this building and the road will
curve
> around to the left and you will see the goblin huts off to the right after
a
> short distance on this trail.
>
> Third one is when you come to the cross roads guard shack, coming from
gfay,
> take a right when you get the next guard shack take a left right off the
> trail and you will come to another goblin camp (goblin warriors, no
wizards
> here).
>
> On a side note if you go past the goblin warrior camp you will come to a
> bandit camp, careful here as the lvl range is large and they have a pretty
> large argo range for their lvl. I think they can go from 9 to 14 (peg leg
> is 14 or so). Spawn is pretty fast. 1 roamer here spawns on the wall
> across from the camp and can argo the camp when he runs out to get you.
His
> name, Qued ( I think). He is my arch nemesis. I hate this guy and I
think
> to this day he is still responsible for the majority of my deaths. I cant
> count the number of times I was fighting a goblin or a bat or something
and
> this SOB came up and started backstabbing me with his fists. I am sure I
> died at least 30 times to this guy.
>
> Rambled long enough.
>
> Mu
> 6 more days to eq
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> Sent: Monday, March 19, 2001 4:44 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Cultural Armor costs...
>
>
> I'm not sure which one is hte Southeast goblin camp...
> Oh well, I'll look for it. thanks!
> luv,
> -Su
